name: Easy Enoki Mushroom Larb Recipe (Laab Hed)
description: This delicious enoki mushroom larb salad is packed with protein and full of flavor, and it makes a tasty and easy lunch or dinner.

video.name: ลาบเห็ดเข็มทอง แซ่บๆ

recipeInstructions.text: Cut off the roots of the mushrooms and rinse them under running cold water. Boil the enoki mushrooms in a pan or pot for just 1–2 minutes. They should get a bit tender, but still keep their bite. Once done, drain them in a sieve.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut off the roots of the mushrooms and rinse them under running cold water. Boil the enoki mushrooms in a pan or pot for just 1–2 minutes. They should get a bit tender, but still keep their bite. Once done, drain them in a sieve.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the ground pork until it's fully done, then toss it into the same sieve to let it drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the ground pork until it's fully done, then toss it into the same sieve to let it drain.

recipeInstructions.text: In a big mixing bowl, toss all ingredients. Toss the pork, mushrooms, fish sauce, sugar, toasted rice powder, red chili flakes, all the herbs, shallots, and squeeze in fresh lime juice. Gently mix, and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: In a big mixing bowl, toss all ingredients. Toss the pork, mushrooms, fish sauce, sugar, toasted rice powder, red chili flakes, all the herbs, shallots, and squeeze in fresh lime juice. Gently mix, and serve immediately.
